Html:
I have been playing with this tool sometime it works brilliantly on local machine but all of sudden when I copied in to network drive I was able to see markers but no map is visible . I was using Google maps. I don't think that this is something to do with this tool except with only with VS2010.
Am I right . Please help me Radio man
i've never tested it on network drive

Hi radioman,

just one more clarification .... please
do we need a Google API key to use this tool ( No right)

actually it's not used anywhere anymore:

The Google Maps JavaScript API v3 does not require an API key to function correctly

How can I use my application on server where application works fine but only maps are not displayed on server.
when i publish my application my windows application is working fine except maps not shows but markers are displayed please help radioman.

__GMapProvider.WebProxy = WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy();
GMapProvider.WebProxy.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;__
when i use this i get error.
the name 'GMapProvider' does not exist in the current context .
